title: Uzbek envoy congratulates nation on Eid-ul-Adha
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 07 (APP): Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Uzbekistan to Pakistan, Alisher Tukhtaev in his special message on the occasion of Eid-ul-Adha, congratulated the Pakistani nation and leadership and expressed his best wishes on this auspicious occasion.
In his special message on the occasion of Eid-ul-Adha here on Saturday, the Ambassador Alisher Tukhtaev said that Pakistan and Uzbekistan have decades-old brotherly relations, which are based on the mutual bond of love and faith between the people of both countries, and on this great day, “I pray for further strengthening of these bilateral relations between both sides.
“I congratulate the People of Pakistan not as the Ambassador of Uzbekistan but as a brother on this auspicious occasion of Eid and, following our Islamic values, “I request for special consideration for our neighbors and the needy people around.”
Uzbek envoy said that on the occasion of the great day of Eid, “I pray that prosperity comes to every home in Pakistan and that every child here is an educated person.”
Today is a day of renewal of commitment and sacrifice and “I renew this pledge today that Uzbekistan will always stand with Pakistan as a brother with the same strength as before and both countries will progress double day and night.”
He expressed the hope that the future of Pakistan and the region will always be bright, and the journey of peace, security and development will continue.
